Good night everyone.

::Zardus/The Oblitercons/DevilDuer::

Zardus looks down at his scanners, swearing as he sees the battle, and as he 
recieves Starscream's and Wheeljack's transmissions. He activates his 
comm-link, sending a transmission to all Alliance troops in the area (I think 
that's all of them but Feline, Skulletron, and Perndabot).

"Alliance bots," the transmission reads, "There is a battle against the 
Maximals several clicks northeast of the base. Stranato, Inzola, Burning 
Hammer, can you back the Alliance troops up? Starscream, I'd apreciate if you 
help to. I'll send the Oblitercons to help against Megatron later on. Gotron, 
please go and help Wheeljack retrieve a probe? After you two have it secure 
in the base, you go to the battle. Wheeljack should stay and run a few tests 
on it. I'll be arriving at the fight shortly."

He turns around as he ends the transmission, looking at Sickle and motioning 
for him to follow as he heads out of the bridge. "Do you know if you can 
fight at all?" he asks him, glancing back over his shoulder.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dark One recieves Zardus' orders, looking back at Squizzy.

"Hurry," he says, "Let's get to the CR chambers. I need to get back to the 
battle."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer barely jumps out of the way of the shots, hearing Zardus' 
transmission with relief. Soon, there would be reinforcements. That would be 
very welcome.

He fires another shot as his stun gun finally runs out of energy, DevilDuer 
quickly swapping it for a small rifle and firing again at Astral.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scavenger ducks as he hears a yell behind him, an optic blast grazing his 
shoulder. 

He spins around, a rocket launcher apearing in his hand from subspace, firing 
two rockets at Fenox.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Pyro smiles evilly at Giplash, jumping back and standing ready.

"Very well. I can kill you that way too," he says, one hand moving behind his 
back, the other holding his sword steady.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Breakdown shakes as shots from the pistol hit him, the artillery cannon 
spinning around.

The heavily armored wheels start to turn, sending him driving toward 
Starlight, firing a rocket at her from the cannon.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hiss yells as a beam hits him in the stomach, sending him spinning down to 
the ground. He stops himself a few feet above the tress, burning pain coming 
from his abdomen.

Transforming into his much smaller gun mode, Hiss flies up again, firing shot 
after shot at Recklessa.
